Key Match Events: Aaron Jones hit 11 before being run out and seven runs came via extras
Iftikhar Ahmed took Pakistan to five for none off three balls
Nitish Kumar caught Iftikhar Ahmed close to the boundary
Saurabh Netravalkar restricted Pakistan to 13 for one in the Super Over
Aaron Jones hit a six off the third last ball and a four off the final delivery to tie the match
Pre-Game Insights: USA captain Monank Patel emphasized the importance of utilizing conditions and credit to the bowlers

Post-Match Reflections: USA captain Monank Patel expressed pride in the team's effort and performance
Pakistan captain Babar Azam praised USA's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went to the extra over after both sides made 159 in their 20 overs
The USA had already beaten Canada in their opener by seven wickets
Others: The USA will face India in their next match
The ICC is working to resolve issues with the pitch at the Nassau County Cricket Stadium
